title: Body language expert claims Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson's romance is fake
text:
They have been flaunting their steamy new relationship all over social media.

But a body language expert has claimed Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson's romance is 'fake' and the couple's raunchy pictures are all for attention.

Speaking to WHO magazine on Wednesday, Blanca Clobb said Cody is 'enjoying the moment' and Miley is proving she 'doesn't care about comments or criticism.'

Is it real love? A body language expert has claimed that Miley Cyrus (left) and Cody Simpson's (right) romance is FAKE

Blanca continued to explain that a recent photo of Miley putting her hands down the Australian singer's pants was just posted for 'shock value.'

She said: 'Miley's hand down the front of Cody's pants is all about shock value to the world and a secret message between the two of them.'

This comes after it was reported that Miley is using her relationship to try and make her estranged husband Liam Hemsworth 'jealous'.

Revealed: Expert Blanca Clobb said: 'Miley's hand down the front of Cody's pants is all about shock value to the world and a secret message between the two of them'

Speaking to RadarOnline.com, a source said: 'She was drunk dialling him for a while, so now she's resorted to social media to get his attention.'

'This romance with Cody, supposed hospital visit and constant 'look at me' behaviour is all designed to push Liam's buttons,' the insider continued.

'It's always worked in the past because he's a good guy who ultimately loves her, but now he's just rolling his eyes and washing his hands of her, even as a friend, which of course is driving Miley nuts.'

'It's all designed to push Liam's buttons': This comes after it was reported Miley is using her relationship with Cody (pictured) to get her estranged husband's 'attention'

Liam and Miley called it quits in June after 'drifting apart', but the former couple did not confirm their split until August.

The pair, who married in December, had been dating on-and-off for 10 years after meeting on the set of The Last Song in 2009.

Cody and Miley began dating just two months after the American singer announced her separation from Liam.
description: A body language expert has claimed Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson's romance is 'fake' and the couple's raunchy pictures are all for attention.
authors: Mary Mrad For Daily Mail Australia
